title: North 3-2-2 House- PRE LEASING -Avail Sept/Oct- No Pets or Smokers
map_address: North Austin in Quail Hollow/Gracywoods Subdivision
street_address: North Austin in Quail Hollow/Gracywoods Subdivision
posting_body: North Austin 3-2-2 home conveniently located within 5 minutes or less to The Domain, local breweries, Top Golf,Metro Rail, Q 2 Stadium with easy access to Mopac, IH-35 & 183.
Mother-in-law floor plan where the Master bedroom is separated and on opposite ends from the other 2 bedrooms.
Home is located in the Pflugerville Independent School District.
Tenant is responsible for all utilities and lawn maintenance.
Monthly rent is $2,050.00 , Security Deposit is $2,050.00 ....
This home could be ready for move in as early as  September 1st.

If you meet the rental criteria and are interested in this rental property, please reply back with your projected move in date, how many occupants will be occupying the property and what is their relationship to you.
Any other information you would like me to know about yourself would be greatly appreciated.
* Good previous rental history is required and must be verified by a property management company or apartment complex.
* Verifiable income of 3 times rent required.
* FICO Credit Score of 680 or higher per each applicant.
Credit and back ground checks will be run.
* First and last months rent in addition to the security deposit required at lease signing.
* No Pets or Smoking allowed at anytime on the leased premises.
